import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import api from'../services/api';import{Container,Title,Input,Button,TodoItem,TodoText,TodoButton,Form}from'../StyledComponents';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as api.updateTodo(id,updatedDescription,updatedStatus);fetchTodos();}catch(error){console.error('Failed to update todo:',error);}}};const handleDeleteTodo=async id=>{try{await default Todos;
